agents.impl.dhcp

Class DhcpClientAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.MetaAgent
      • agents.SystemAgent
        • agents.impl.dhcp.NetworkableAgent
          • agents.impl.dhcp.DhcpClientAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DhcpClient

    public class DhcpClientAgent
extends NetworkableAgent
implements DhcpClient
    MetaAgent implementation of the client-side version of the DHCP protocol.
    See Also:
    DhcpClient

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canReceive(Message message)
      Checks whether the message is using the DHCP protocol and can be received via the traditional way.
      void dhcpDiscover()
      Broadcasts a DHCP (Discover) message to attempt to find a DHCP server to handle future requests.
      void dhcpRequest(java.lang.String sender)
      Sends a request to the DHCP server that has replied via their 'Offer' message.
      protected void execute(Message message)
      Executes the handleDhcp(agents.Message) method if the message can be received and is using the DHCP protocol.
      void handleDhcp(Message message)
      An entry point for the DHCP methodology to where messages that are executed run this method.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        protected void execute(Message message)
        Executes the handleDhcp(agents.Message) method if the message can be received and is using the DHCP protocol.
        Specified by:
        execute in class MetaAgent
        Parameters:
        message - The incoming message.

      • canReceive

        public boolean canReceive(Message message)
        Checks whether the message is using the DHCP protocol and can be received via the traditional way.
        Overrides:
        canReceive in class NetworkableAgent
        Parameters:
        message - The message to check.
        Returns:
        True if the message is using the DHCP protocol; false otherwise.

      • dhcpDiscover

        public void dhcpDiscover()
        Broadcasts a DHCP (Discover) message to attempt to find a DHCP server to handle future requests. Sends a message via the parent portal to broadcast DHCP discovery intent. DHCP servers will receive and handle this by initiating the DHCP process and offering their service(s).
        Specified by:
        dhcpDiscover in interface DhcpClient
        See Also:
        DhcpServer.dhcpOffer(agents.Message)

      • dhcpRequest

        public void dhcpRequest(java.lang.String sender)
        Sends a request to the DHCP server that has replied via their 'Offer' message.
        Specified by:
        dhcpRequest in interface DhcpClient
        Parameters:
        sender - The qualifying address of the DHCP server.
        See Also:
        DhcpServer.dhcpOffer(agents.Message), DhcpServerAgent.dhcpOffer(agents.Message)

      • handleDhcp

        public void handleDhcp(Message message)
        An entry point for the DHCP methodology to where messages that are executed run this method. This method should implement the behaviour that distinguishes the messages from the server into the respective DHCP methods.
        Specified by:
        handleDhcp in interface DhcpClient
        Parameters:
        message - The message that is passed via MetaAgent.execute(agents.Message).
